
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(gstat)
library(sp)
```

```{r}
url<-'https://datahub-content.chesapeakebay.net/traditional_annual_tidal_02jun21/2019_CEDR_tidal_data_01jun21.xlsx'
tf <- tempfile()
download.file(url, tf)
wq_19 <-read_excel(path = tf, col_names = c("SampleDate", "Parameter", "MeasureValue", "Latitude", "Longitude"))
```

```{r}
wq <- rbind(wq_10, wq_11, wq_12, wq_13, wq_14, wq_15, wq_16, wq_17, wq_18, wq_19)
```

```{r}
rm(wq_10, wq_11, wq_12, wq_13, wq_14, wq_15, wq_16, wq_17, wq_18, wq_19)
```


```{r}
wq <- wq %>% 
  filter(Parameter=="TN")
```

```{r}
ggplot(wq, aes(x=SampleDate, y=MeasureValue)) +
  geom_smooth()
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tsibble)
```

```{r}
class(wq$SampleDate)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tsibble)
library(lubridate)


wq <- wq %>% 
  mutate(yr_mo = yearmonth(SampleDate)) %>%
  group_by(yr_mo) %>%
  summarize(monthly_avg = mean(MeasureValue, na.rm = TRUE))
```
